navigation.addPoint: Add a point on the map

hero.option1: Discover an interactive map that opens up a world of football opportunities for you!
hero.option2: Check what's happening in your area and join the game!

siteDescription.desc1: Here you will find all the important information about tournaments, six-a-side leagues, kids' football schools, fields for rent, and football-related services.
siteDescription.desc2: Check what's happening in your area and join the game!
siteDescription.title: Discover an interactive map that opens up a world of football opportunities!

users.desc1: Stay up to date with football events in your area and join local tournaments!
users.desc2: Easily find places where your kids can improve their skills under the guidance of professional coaches.
users.desc3: Rent a field for a game with friends or for training.

owners.desc1: Post announcements about your football events to attract more participants and spectators.
owners.desc2: Increase the use of your facilities by sharing information about available times on the map.
owners.desc3: Attract new students by adding details about your training offer and location.
